subject: Tennis
Madrid Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams will meet Victoria Azarenka in the final of the Madrid Open on Sunday after beating the qualifier Lucie Hradecka, 7-6 (5), 6-0.
snippet: Serena Williams will meet Victoria Azarenka in the final of the Madrid Open on Sunday after beating the qualifier Lucie Hradecka, 7-6 (5), 6-0.
